cities.name: Tirana

interests.name: Skanderbeg Square (Sheshi Sk√´nderbej)
interests.description: The city‚Äôs main plaza and the easiest place to get your bearings‚Äîsurrounded by major museums, ministries, and landmark buildings, and buzzing in the evenings with locals strolling.

interests.description: A historic Ottoman-era mosque near the center, known for its rare landscape frescoes‚Äîremember to dress respectfully and be quiet during prayer times.

interests.name: Dajti Ekspres Cable Car (Lower Station)
interests.description: The quickest city-to-mountain escape: ride up toward Mount Dajti for cooler air, big views, short walks, and a totally different vibe from downtown.

cities.local_food_tip: Go for a classic Tirana food day: grab a flaky byrek for breakfast, try tav√´ kosi or grilled qofte for lunch, and end with trile√ße (milk cake) or akullore (gelato). If you see fresh seasonal fruit at Pazari i Ri, snack like a local.

full_day.Morning: Start in Skanderbeg Square ‚òÄÔ∏è for the classic Tirana ‚Äúfirst look‚Äù (wide plaza, big buildings, people-watching). Step into Et'hem Bey Mosque üïå if it‚Äôs open (quiet voice, covered shoulders/knees). Then walk a few minutes to Pazari i Ri ü•ï for colors, local produce, and easy snacks.
full_day.Afternoon: Dive into history at Bunk'Art 2 üß† (give yourself time‚Äîsome exhibits are heavy but important). Afterward, decompress with a walk to the Pyramid of Tirana üî∫ to see the city‚Äôs modern, youth-driven side.
full_day.Sunset: Take the ride from Dajti Ekspres (Lower Station) üö° and aim to be up in the mountains for golden-hour views üåÑ‚Äîit‚Äôs one of the best ways to ‚Äòfeel‚Äô Tirana‚Äôs geography in a single afternoon.
full_day.Night: Come back into town for a relaxed evening in Blloku ‚ú®‚Äîlots of casual dinner options, dessert spots, and friendly caf√© energy. If you want something calmer, finish with a night walk around the lake at the Grand Park üåô.

spring.description: Tirana turns festive and outdoorsy‚Äîparks and public spaces fill up with families, music, and that ‚Äòwinter is over‚Äô mood. Expect crowds, street snacks, and a celebratory feel across the city.

ideas.name: Skanderbeg Square celebration stroll
ideas.description: Start central and follow the flow of people‚Äîthis is where the city energy is easiest to catch.

ideas.name: Grand Park picnic vibe

ideas.name: Pazari i Ri seasonal snacks

ideas.name: House of Leaves (Museum of Secret Surveillance)
ideas.description: A meaningful museum for a deeper look at modern history‚Äîgreat for a spring afternoon if rain hits.

summer.event: Long evenings in Tirana + mountain escapes

ideas.name: Evening loop at Grand Park

ideas.name: Blloku caf√©-hopping
ideas.description: Try a couple of caf√©s for drinks/dessert‚Äîperfect for a teen-friendly night out with family.

autumn.description: Crisp weather and a sporty, community feel‚Äîparts of the city become a race route, and it‚Äôs fun even if you‚Äôre just watching and cheering.

ideas.name: Watch runners near Skanderbeg Square
ideas.description: Central viewing with lots of atmosphere and easy access to caf√©s afterward.

ideas.name: Tirana Castle (Kalaja e Tiran√´s) evening browse

winter.description: Cooler days with a cozy caf√© culture‚Äîexpect festive lights around central squares, warm desserts, and a calmer pace in museums and galleries.

ideas.name: City-center lights around Skanderbeg Square
ideas.description: Even if you don‚Äôt shop, it‚Äôs a fun winter walk with photo spots and hot drinks nearby.

ideas.name: Bunk'Art 2 on a rainy day

ideas.name: House of Leaves museum afternoon
ideas.description: One of the most memorable museums in the center‚Äîgreat for learning and reflection.

public_transport_tips.tip: Use city buses for cheap, practical rides‚Äîespecially to connect neighborhoods like the center, Pazari i Ri, and other urban lines (carry small cash and expect busy peak hours).
For the airport, the official Rinas‚ÄìTirana bus is a straightforward option and runs 24/7 with published frequency and price details.
To reach Mount Dajti by cable car, check the official Dajti Ekspres directions and plan timing (especially if you want to catch sunset up top).

city_events.name: Dita e Ver√´s (Summer Day)
city_events.description: National spring celebration (public holiday) with outdoor activities and a festive city vibe‚ÄîTirana gets especially lively in parks and central areas.

city_events.description: A major film event in the capital with screenings and industry attention; dates vary by year.

city_events.description: The capital‚Äôs biggest running event with multiple race distances and a great spectator atmosphere.

places.description: A museum focused on surveillance and daily life under the communist-era security system‚Äîintense but very informative.

hidden_gems.description: A modern public art piece that‚Äôs fun to walk through and photograph‚Äîeasy to combine with a boulevard stroll.
